name: Moon Mission (Poop Dollar)
description:
Ship the Shuttle!

Get your space shuttle past the enemy invaders and to the moon while dodging and exploding your way to the end! Use the Spacebar to shoot and WASD to move. Press B to fire a missile, but be careful you have a limited supply! You can press R or Enter at any time to restart. If you touch a enemy or enemy bullet you will lose a life, lose all 5 lives and it's game over! You will gain lives and bombs periodically. Do you accept the misison?

This game was made for Bullet Hell Jam 2022 in 7 days.

All assets are original. The soundtrack is uploaded as a downloadable.
